description:
Kiyo after managing to lose Zatch and Ponygon goes to school. Once there, the teacher Touyama tries to give Kiyo a failing grade by asking him what is his cat`s name. Kiyo manages to figure it out, but Touyama reveals he has a secret weapon
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ai to Seishun no Monmon-sensei: Kyomaru Higeki no Zanpai
The Love and Youth of Mr. Mommon, Kiyo`s Disastrous Defeat
愛と青春のモンモン先生 清麿悲劇の惨敗
